Bridges:
An edge in an undirected connected graph is a bridge iff removing it disconnects the graph. A naive solution to finding bridges in a graph is to:
1.Delete an edge E
2.Perform DFS Exploration to check is Graph is connected
3.Restore Edge E. E is a bridge only if DFS explore determines that the graph is disconnected without E
Applications: Find vulnerabilities in Graphs and Electrical Circuits

files.naive: Find all the bridges in an Undirected Graph
